Statute.Title: Canadian Arsenals Limited Divestiture Authorization Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Société Les Arsenaux canadiens Limitée, Loi autorisant l’aliénation de la)

Minister.Text: Minister of Public Works and Government Services

General.Text: Consequential, s. 11 (see R.S., c. 15 (2nd Supp.), s. 1)

CIF.Text: CIF, 1986, c. 20, s. 9 proclaimed in force 06.05.86 see SI/86‑69; s. 3(2) and ss. 10 to 12 proclaimed in force 07.05.86 see SI/86‑69
